source:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Many would deign to call themselves able, but Yazel Ahuatan the Able goes so far as to claim it as his title.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 1 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 41 and above.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
※本クエストは、クラフタークラス：レベル1以上、
　バトルクラス：レベル41以上推奨です。

エカトル実験場の職工のヤゼル・アファタンは、冒険者に火急の依頼があるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_01Questioning your skills as an artisan, Yazel Ahuatan invites you to prove him wrong by crafting a bladder component with the materials he has provided. His challenge is further complicated by the requirement that you use special facilities in Hyrstmill to craft the component─facilities which are administered by Dametta, a woman of some repute, who may not be amenable to your request.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_01※本クエストには「 レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

職工のヤゼル・アファタンから「」の製作を依頼された。ハーストミルの「アメッタ」に製作施設の使用許可をもらおう。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_02<tab>Dametta is willing to grant you permission to use her facilities─provided you carry out a simple task in exchange. A particularly persistent opo<var 1F /var>opo has been raiding her stores for some time, and she would have you permanently resolve the situation. With the aid of ripe Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy beans, lure the beastkin out from his lair near E<var 1F /var>Tatt's Spire and end his reign of terror once and for all. Alternatively, you could converse with the woman further and attempt to persuade her...but that approach may not end well.
target: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_02<tab>製作施設を使う条件として、アメッタから泥棒猿の討伐を頼まれた。エ・タッタ監視哨付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E95E401 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89DE01 /var>」を使い、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20BA801 /var>」をおびき寄せて退治しよう。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_03<tab>The notorious bean thief is no more, and the claw you have extricated from its carcass should serve as ample proof. Present it and the bladder component materials to Dametta in Hyrstmill.
target: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20BA801 /var>を討伐した。ハーストミルの「アメッタ」に証拠の品「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89DF01 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89DD01 /var>」を渡し、製作施設の使用許可をもらおう。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_04The claw serves both to horrify Dametta's sensibilities and satisfy her requirements. With the materials provided to you by Yazel Ahuatan, synthesize a bladder component, and deliver it to him at Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Production wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Dametta.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_04製作施設の準備が整った。「」をもとに「」を製作し、エカトル実験場の「職工のヤゼル・アファタン」に納品しよう。

※バフステータス「製作施設：部材工作」が終了した場合や、「」を失った場合は、再びアメッタに話しかけましょう。バフステータスと材料が付与され、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_05<tab>The most able of Ixal accepts your work with a mighty squa-hawk, satisfied with its quality. Within you he sees a great potential─one which he likens to his own, glimpsed by Chief Totoloc long ago. Weighty words indeed, one might say─though one must always consider the source, as well.
target: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SEQ_05<tab>職工のヤゼル・アファタンに<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8091)) 01 /var>を納品した。彼が仕事に打ち込む理由は、天涯孤独だった自分を育ててくれた親方に報いたいとの思いからだった。「デズル・クワラン号」の建造にたずさわる者たちは、それぞれの願いを込めて夢の飛空艇と向き合っているのだろう。
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_TODO_00<tab>ハーストミルのアメッタと話す

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_TODO_01<tab>Use the ripe Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy beans to lure out the salivating simian.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_TODO_01エ・タッタ監視哨付近のにを使い、
現れたを討伐

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_TODO_02<tab>Present the simian claw and the bladder component materials to Dametta.
target: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_TODO_02<tab>ハーストミルのアメッタに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89DF01 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89DD01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a bladder component)) ((Deliver the bladder component to Yazel Ahuatan the Able)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエストLv1：<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8091)) 01 /var>を製作)) ((職工のヤゼル・アファタンに<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8091)) 01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_000<tab>Squahaha! An able crafter, featherless one is? Not so able as Yazel, I think! Yet prove me wrong, you may, and aid Ehcatl in so doing!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_000お、おい、！
至急「」を作ってくれんかッァ！
材料はちゃんと用意してあるぞッォ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_010<tab>An emergency release valve, for use with an airship bladder, we require! A simple task for a featherless one skilled as you, Yazel trusts.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_010作ってほしいのはッァ、ガス抜き用のバルブなんじゃッァ！
飛空艇の高度を下げたいときには、
気嚢からガスを抜かにゃあならんッン！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_020<tab>Tanning agents for treating materials used to craft an airship bladder, we require! A simple task for a featherless one skilled as you, Yazel trusts.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_020作ってほしいのはッァ、純度の高いなめし剤なんじゃッァ！
気嚢に使う皮革材をなめすのに、
どうしても必要なんじゃッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_030<tab>Leather and canvas used to craft an airship bladder, we require! A simple task for a featherless one skilled as you, Yazel trusts.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_030作ってほしいのはッァ、球皮材ってモンじゃッァ！
高々度の低い気圧にも耐えられる、
丈夫な気嚢を作るために必要なんじゃッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_040<tab>A skilled <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var> and listener both, Yazel hopes you are, for the aid of a featherless chatterbox, you require, to use these materials. Squa-hawk! For this component, the facilities of Dametta, you must utilize.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_040ワシらは、ヒトの製作施設も抜かりなく調査ずみよッゥ！
ハーストミルという集落に作業しやすい設備があるッゥ。
「アメッタ」って女に設備を借りて、部材を仕上げてくれッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_050<tab>The ramblings of the chatterbox, you must endure, if to Yazel you wish to prove yourself able. Squa-hawk!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_050ハーストミルで「」を作ってくれんかッァ！
「アメッタ」って女に設備を借りて、部材を仕上げてくれッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_060<tab>Oh my, you wish to use these facilities? They are lovely, aren't they? I do my utmost to keep them in tip-top condition, you know! Regular cleaning and maintenance is far more essential than most people realize.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_060この場所を仕事に使いたいって？
たしかに、どっしりした石作りの作業台もあるし、
手仕事にはもってこいさね。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_061<tab>However, as much as I'd love to let you do so, I must ask that you do something in exchange. Worry not, it's nothing too difficult! Just a simple favor. I do have to clean up after you, you know!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_061お代がわりって言っちゃ何だけど、ひとつ頼まれておくれよ。
最近増えた「」を退治してほしいんだ。
ムントゥイ豆を狙う、小汚い泥棒猿どもさ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_062<tab>Know you of opo<var 1F /var>opos? Dreadful little scamps, always stealing my Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy beans. One in particular has given me no end of trouble, and I will suffer it no longer! Pray use these ripe beans to lure him out from his lair near E<var 1F /var>Tatt's Spire and end his reign of terror! And, though it's a grisly thing to ask, I must insist that you return with proof of the deed─a fang, or a claw, or something of that nature. Nothing too large, mind you. I don't want it as a trophy to hang on my wall. I'm not a monster!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_062あいつら、エ・タッタ監視哨あたりが縄張りらしくてさ。
「」を撒けば出てくると思うんだ。
退治の証拠に「」を持ってきてよ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_070<tab>Truth be told, I've no real desire to see proof of the deed. However, I've been deceived before─not to imply that you're a liar like <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> adventurer was, of course!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_070「」をおびき寄せるには、
エ・タッタ監視哨あたりで「」を撒けばいい。
退治の証拠に「」を持ってきてよ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_071<tab>You see, he came through the other day and, like you, he wished to use these facilities. I told him─as I told you─that I would gladly permit him to do so, if only he first dealt with a certain opo<var 1F /var>opo. So off he went for the better part of a day, eventually returning to report that the deed was done! Naturally, I was beside myself with joy, and I went to bed that night thinking that the opo<var 1F /var>opo was no more and all was right with the world.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_071ところであんた、ヒマなのかい？
退治に向かう前に、ちょっと話につきあっておくれよ。
やぁね、すぐにすむわよ～。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_072<tab>Needless to say, I was <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> cross when I awoke to find my stores pilfered yet again, and the ground stained with <var 1A 02 /var>copious<var 1A 01 /var> amounts of saliva─incontrovertible evidence that my sworn enemy yet lived! I made up my mind then and there to give that adventurer a piece of my mind─especially once I learned he had spent that afternoon <var 1A 02 /var>drinking in a pub<var 1A 01 /var> instead of tracking my opo<var 1F /var>opo.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_072ここは、森の恵みに満ちた最高の場所だからね……
この間、別の職人さんが…………………ときも……
……でもそれは…………さすがにどうかと…………

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_073<tab>But despite learning of his nefarious deeds, I never was able to track him down, which was surprising given how queer a fellow he was! He had <var 1A 02 /var>onions<var 1A 01 /var> tied to his belt, which I don't need to tell you is <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> unusual. When I asked him about them, he said it was the style at the time he was growing up, and he'd always had a fondness for his grandfather's ways...
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_073そこでこっちも…………ムントゥイ豆を…………
そしたら…………煮すぎちゃったみたいでさ……
…………あんたも料理…………気をつけ…………

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SYSTEM_100_073<tab>As Dametta struggles to recall if the onions were white or yellow, your mind begins to wander...
target: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_SYSTEM_100_073<tab>アメッタの話は続いている……。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_POP_MESSAGE<tab>The opo<var 1F /var>opo sprays saliva in your general direction!

TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_090<tab>As I told you before, you are more than welcome to make use of these facilities─provided you deal with that dastardly opo<var 1F /var>opo first. Oh, and as a precaution, I must ask that you present your materials for inspection as well. You would be <var 1A 02 /var>shocked<var 1A 01 /var> by what some people have tried to make here!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_090「」を持ってきたのかい？
だったら、この場所を使わせてあげなきゃね。
下準備をするから、持ち込んだ材料と一緒に貸してごらん。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_091<tab>My word, is that really... Oh gods, I can't bear to look at it! Take it from my sight and dispose of it─but not in the river! Now then, deep breaths... Though unusual, I don't believe your materials could be used for evil ends. Here you are. You'll note I didn't return them all─there are several times the required materials, it would seem. Whoever entrusted this task to you left a note in the bag: “To featherless neuker, give only required parts. In case of failure, retain spares.” Hmmm... What in the world is a “neuker”?
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_091おやまあ、ずいぶん多めに持ち込んだんだね？
かさばる袋は預かって、材料は製作に必要な分だけ返すよ。
あとはこの場所を、好きに使って製作するんだね！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_100<tab>Oh, do you require more time with the facilities? By all means, take as long as you like! And if you require additional materials, let me know. I have plenty here for the “featherless neuker.”
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_000_100材料が足りなくなったり、
またこの場所を使いたくなったら、声をかけてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_100_100<tab>Is that the finished product? I...I have no idea what that is, but it looks splendid! I'm sure your client will love it! Ah─it so happens there was another note in the bag: “Retain spare parts, in case featherless neuker loses component en route.” He really doesn't trust you, does he?
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_DAMETTA_100_100仕事は終わったみたいだから、早く納品に行きなよ！
製作した品をなくしたりして、また作りなおすときは、
声をかけておくれ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_130<tab>Squahaha! Returned, the one who would prove <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> able is! Bladder component, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has brought?
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_130どうだッァ？
「」は作ってきてくれたかッァ……？

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_131<tab>...Squa-hawk! Able indeed, featherless one is! Within you lies great potential, as Chief Totoloc said.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_131おおッォ……感謝感激じゃッァ！
は世界いち……
いや、親方の次にエエお方じゃッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_132<tab>Potential in Yazel too, the chief once saw. Not wrong in either case, it is more than clear to me! Squawk!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_YAZELAHUATAN_000_132身寄りのないワシを拾ってくれた親方にやっと報いられる……
親方の、ワシら空力団の夢に、また一歩近づけたわッァ！
うぅッゥ、涙ちょちょぎれそうじゃッァ……！

source: TEXT_BANIXA101_01494_POPMESSAGE_000_200<tab>You now have access to the crafting facility.
